Title: The Black Wolf
Plot: Xena infiltrates a band of rebels led by the Black Wolf and helps them defend themselves against Xerxes the warlord.
GuestStars: Robert Trebor, Kevin J. Wilson, Nigel Harbrow, Emma Turner, Ian Hughes, Maggie Tarver, Ross Duncan, John Dybvig, Jonathan Bell-Booth, John Pemberton, Tim Hosking, Colin Francis, Adam Middleton, Jimmy Rawdon
